short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent prying eyes from peeking at your page! This extension lets you darken any page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you darken any page.
This may be useful for privacy reasons or for eyesight / lighting reasons.
You can set the degree of darkening in the extension's options.
